actions.description: The dragon makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 12 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (2d10 + 6) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) necrotic damage.
actions.name: Bite

actions.description: 12 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d6 + 6) slashing damage.
actions.name: Claw

actions.description: The dragon exhales yellowish necrotic energy in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 20 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 49 (14d6) necrotic damage and is weakened until the end of its next turn. A weakened creature has disadvantage on Strength-based ability checks and Strength saving throws, and the creature's weapon attacks that rely on Strength deal half damage. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't weakened.
actions.name: Desiccating Breath (Recharge 5-6)

actions.description:
The dragon casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 19):
1/day each: antilife shell, bane, control water, create or destroy water
actions.name: Spellcasting (Psionics)

actions.description: The dragon makes one Claw attack.
actions.name: Claw

actions.description: The dragon uses Psychic Step or Spellcasting.
actions.name: Psionics (Costs 2 Actions)

actions.description: The dragon targets a creature or an object not being worn or carried that it can see within 60 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 19 Constitution saving throw or take 40 (9d8) necrotic damage. If this damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, it crumbles to dust.
actions.name: Essential Reduction (Costs 3 Actions)

specialTraits.description: The dragon can breathe both air and water.
specialTraits.name: Amphibious

specialTraits.description: The dragon can cast fabricate, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability.
specialTraits.name: Fabricate (1/Day)

specialTraits.description: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.
specialTraits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
